subject: Deaths (Fatalities)
Motorcycle Racing
Motorcycles, Motor Bikes and Motorscooters
lead_paragraph: Marco Simoncelli of Italy died in a crash at the Malaysian MotoGP at the Kuala Lumpur track where he won the 250cc world title in 2008.
snippet: Marco Simoncelli of Italy died in a crash at the Malaysian MotoGP at the Kuala Lumpur track where he won the 250cc world title in 2008.
